Milinda：（國王名）彌林達，  （古音譯：）彌蘭陀，彌蘭王

milinda： milinda（pu）
မိလိန္ဒ（ပု）

Milinda：King of Sāgala．He was born in Kalasi in Alasandā．

His discussions with the Buddhist Elder Nāgasena are recorded in theMilinda-Pañha．It is said there that the king embraced Buddhism．

For a discussion on the facts connected with Milinda，and his identification with the Baktrian king Menander，see Questions of King Milinda，vol．i．，introd．xviiiff．

milinda：မိလိန္ဒ（ပု）

မိလိန္ဒ（မင်း၊ကျောင်း）။
